attributes.action: Consider the rights of UK residents above that of immigrant's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We hear more and more of situations where uk born residents are discriminated against for fear of offending an immigrant. A good example of this was Havant council banning the use of the words christmas, father christmas etc. because these words may offend an immigrant who did not believe in Christmas.I find this extreamly offensive to my beliefs.
By all means let people come to our country but don't tell me to honour their beliefs at the cost of my own.
No one forces these people to come here, it's their choice.
